# Producing the documentation for this package

The web page for this package has been produced using `pkgdown`. The following command will be run by [Travis CI](https://travis-ci.org/SKDE-Analyse/dynamiskTabellverk/builds) after pushing to the master branch on [github](https://github.com/SKDE-Analyse/dynamiskTabellverk):
```
pkgdown::build_site()
```


## How to install pkgdown

```
httr::set_config(httr::use_proxy(url="http://www-proxy.helsenord.no", port=8080)) # Only if behind HN proxy
devtools::install_github("r-lib/pkgdown")
```
